summary.span: 命名空间提供高级 GDI+ 图像处理功能。

span.span: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ imaging functionality.

summary.span: 基本图形功能由 命名空间提供。

span.span: Basic graphics functionality is provided by the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了用于记录、 保存图元文件的方法。The class provides methods for recording and saving metafiles. 类使用户能够扩展 GDI + 来支持任何图像格式。The class enables users to extend GDI+ to support any image format. 类提供了用于存储和检索图像文件中的元数据的方法。The class provides methods for storing and retrieving metadata in image files. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 尝试使用在这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
